name: Crystal Goblin
description:
A goblin named Cral has finally arrived on the outskirts of the forbidden Tearwood Forest in his journey to bring eternal darkness and chaos into the world.

The legends say that the prison in which the Old one Tha-Cthanyog slumbers can be opened when all the Celaeno Fragents are placed in the ancient cauldron that sits on a hill inside the forest.

This game is made as part of Finnish College Jam 2021 and was created in around 20 hours or so, by two students who work during the day and are game developers by night!

Miskatonic Book Club:
Niina Keränen - Art/Level Design/Sound Design/Graphic  Design
Santeri Yliniemelä - Scripting/Level Design/Story/Etc. 
https://sleuthberger.itch.io
